title: Taylor Swift pokes fun Blake Shelton and hilariously calls him Blake LIVELY
text:
She was a mega mentor on Monday night's episode of The Voice.

But Taylor Swift didn't leave without poking fun at Blake Shelton.

The songstress, 29, jokingly called the country star Blake Lively while appearing on the show.

Zing! Taylor Swift jokingly called Blake Shelton Blake Lively while appearing as a mega mentor on The Voice on Monday

Taylor Instagrammed the whole thing while sitting in the judge's seat alongside Shelton.

'Here we are at The Voice,' Taylor began, using a cat filter.

Blake was loving the cat look.

'Oh my god... eyes...' Blake said, admiring the digital makeup on his face.

'Oh, it's not Blake Lively': Swift's voice fell as she corrected herself

'I was promised Lively': The Shake It Off singer joked about her appearance with Shelton

'Yeah you have mascara on as a cat. That's one of the perks of being a cat,' Taylor added. 'I'm here with Blake Lively and it's a wonderful...'

Taylor's voice dropped as she corrected herself.

'Oh, it's not Blake Lively,' she said.

Cool cat: Shelton was amused by his digital feline makeup

Team Blake! The Love Story singer was Monday night's mega mentor

Continuing with her Blake roast, she wrote in the story: 'I'm was promised Lively, but Shelton is cool too. So excited to be on @nbcthevoice with @blakeshelton tonight at 8/7c!'

Taylor had previously appeared on the show, and was excited to be back on Monday night's episode.

The songstress admired the coaches' passion for their work, saying on the show: 'I wanted to come on this show because when I was here before I had a really good time.'

Her new title was exciting, too: 'I didn't realize I was going to be called a 'mega-mentor'',' she added. 'That's gonna go straight to my head. I would like a latte right now.'

Taylor snapped her fingers to get that latte, saying: 'No one? Glass of wine?'

Good pals: Blake Lively and her husband Ryan Reynolds at Swift's Fourth Of July party back in 2016
description: The songstress, 29, Instagrammed the whole thing while sitting in the judge's seat alongside Shelton. 'Here we are at The Voice,' Taylor began, using a cat filter.
